backend/main.mo: Defines core challenge, user profile, chat, and storage logic with authorization checks and invite-link integration for managing challenge lifecycle and user data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature changes, affected files, components, and test IDs for recent UI and text‑update requirements with high‑confidence evidence entries.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Aggregates prewritten summaries of all frontend files, describing their roles in navigation, layout, hooks, translations, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Thin wrapper that re-exports the main theme stylesheet from src/index.css.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML document bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app controller handling authentication state, URL-synced screen navigation, challenge status loading, and invitation processing.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Provides the centered mobile-style layout container with scrollable content region for all screens.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentDetail: Renders assignment text with automatic bolding of 'Step X:' headings while preserving line structure and spacing.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with translated states and query cache clearing on logout.
frontend/src/components/AuthIconButton.t: Compact icon-based authentication control handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading indicators and cache reset.
frontend/src/components/AutoInvitationRe: Automatically redeems persisted invitation codes when conditions are met, showing loading and error states. Refreshes related queries and clears stored invitation data after redemption.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeChatTab: Renders challenge chat UI with message sending, editing, replying, scrolling, and participant name resolution. Fetches messages with polling and handles local input state and errors.
frontend/src/components/ChallengeDeleted: Displays a dismissible dialog informing the user that a challenge was deleted. Uses translations and structured popup body sections.
frontend/src/components/ChatReplyReferen: Shows a preview of a replied‑to chat message, resolving sender names and fetching the message if not cached. Falls back gracefully when the referenced message is missing.
frontend/src/components/DevPanel.tsx: Developer-only panel showing auth state and allowing manual query refresh. Not rendered by default and used for debugging.
frontend/src/components/InfoPopups.tsx: Provides buttons that open informational popups based on translation content. Uses SharedPopup and PopupBodySections for structured info dialogs.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSwitcher: Empty placeholder file for a future language switcher component.
frontend/src/components/PopupBodySection: Renders arrays of section objects with optional headings and formatted text for popup content. Supports structured, scroll-friendly popup layouts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileCompletio: Blocks app content until the user completes their profile by entering a name. Handles profile fetching, validation, submission, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/QueryStateGate.t: Provides standardized loading and error UI for React Query results. Renders children only when data is successfully loaded.
frontend/src/components/RecordingFeedbac: Empty placeholder file for future recording feedback UI.
frontend/src/components/SharedPopup.tsx: Wrapper around dialog components providing consistent sizing, scrolling, and structure for all popups. Accepts a trigger, title, description, and content.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Simple theme toggle button that switches between light and dark modes. Uses icons to reflect the current theme.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthPrincipal.ts: Returns authentication status and the authenticated principal string from Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query keys and hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, challenge status, recordings, and chat data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark theme state with persistence and system preference fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserChallengeStatu: Fetches the authenticated user’s challenge status using the backend actor.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nContext.tsx: Implements a simple i18n provider with English translations and a lookup helper.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/en.json: Empty translation file placeholder for English locale.
frontend/src/i18n/locales/es.json: Empty translation file placeholder for Spanish locale.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines a comprehensive English translation dictionary for UI text across multiple screens.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and layout resets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
UI placeholder for the no-active-challenge state, offering recovery, navigation, and localized text.
Placeholder screen for creating and managing challenges with date selection, invitation codes, participant management, and challenge lifecycle actions.
frontend/src/screens/Screen5ManageChalle: Empty file with no implemented content.
Simple placeholder screen showing challenge state info, an optional edit button, and info popups.
Main in‑challenge screen handling tabs, day selection, audio uploads, playback, participant browsing, and challenge state recovery.
frontend/src/screens/UnifiedEntryMenu.ts: Entry menu determining user flow based on authentication and challenge status, with login, create, manage, and info actions.
frontend/src/utils/appUrlState.ts: Utility for reading, writing, and clearing navigation state in URL search parameters.
frontend/src/utils/assignments.ts: Defines the fixed set of 7‑day challenge assignments with titles and detailed instructional content.
frontend/src/utils/challengeContext.ts: Session storage helper for persisting and retrieving the active challenge ID.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDayFormat.ts: Formats challenge day headers using start time and day index, converting backend timestamps to readable dates.
frontend/src/utils/challengeDeletedNotic: Session storage utility for setting, checking, and clearing a 'challenge deleted' notice flag.
frontend/src/utils/challengeRecovery.ts: Resets all client-side challenge state by clearing persisted IDs, URL state, and invalidating/removing related React Query caches.
frontend/src/utils/invitationCodes.ts: Generates a random uppercase alphanumeric invitation code using a restricted character set.
frontend/src/utils/invitationLinks.ts: Builds, parses, clears, and persists invitation link parameters using URL manipulation and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/recordingDayIndex.ts: Converts day numbers between UI (1–7) and backend (0–6) formats with clamping.
Sanitizes error messages, blocks a known migration message, and maps common backend errors to user-friendly text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts, stores, persists, and clears URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining colors, containers, animations, and plugins for the frontend UI.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema version, high-level app summary, and a catalog of existing features with metadata.
